name: Unicorn
text: 【AUTO】 [(3) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] At the beginning of your encore step, if you have 4 or more other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, and this card is 【STAND】, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent, and put up to 1 card from the top of your clock into your waiting room. (Damage may be canceled) 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Can... can I call you... big brother?

name: Jean Bart
text: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《KAN-SEN》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: MY era is just getting started!

name: Belfast
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《KAN-SEN》 character, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Maid Squad's Service" is in your climax area, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《KAN-SEN》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters and this card, and return them to your hand.
flavorText: Please say something should you have a need for me.

name: Cheshire
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Experience When "Owner's Favorites?" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and the total level of your cards in your level is 6 or higher, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the level of that card +1. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Both my body and soul belong to you, Owner! Squeeeze~♡

name: Sheffield
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《KAN-SEN》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or put into the waiting room from your stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《KAN-SEN》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card.
flavorText: "Cleaning" things up with a gun falls perfectly within a maid's normal line of duty.

name: Ying Swei
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《KAN-SEN》 character, this card gets +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand.
flavorText: You know, stone-cold printed text doesn't have that same human touch as something handwritten.

name: Formidable
text: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot move to another position of the stage."
flavorText: I've prepared tea and crumpets.

name: Sirius
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《KAN-SEN》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Afternoon Tea" is in your climax area, and you have another 《KAN-SEN》 character, put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《KAN-SEN》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return to its original place)
flavorText: I have the privilege of fighting for my honorable Master.

name: Drake
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is 8 or higher, this card gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 4 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: You've finally come. What should we start with today?

name: Perseus
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] At the beginning of your attack phase, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent 2 times, and put up to 1 card from the top of your clock into your waiting room. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Still, I'll try to do a good job.

name: Le Malin
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Knight Princesses' Fantasy" is in your climax area, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal 2 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: *Yawn*... Sleepy... I wanna go roll around in bed...

name: Rodney
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《KAN-SEN》 character, you may choose 1 of your opponent's level 0 or lower characters in their center stage, and put it into their waiting room. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.
flavorText: I'm here to help you with anything you need.

name: Cygnet
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent has 1 or less character in their center stage, you may choose 1 cost 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it at the bottom of their deck. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: For the sake of getting fish and chips, I will do my best!

name: Ajax
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax with in its trigger icon is placed on your climax area, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step." 【AUTO】 When this card's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Would you like to take a look? *Giggles*

name: Ark Royal
text: 【CONT】 If you have another 《KAN-SEN》 character, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "All Too Reliable Side of Her" is placed on your climax area, if you have another 《KAN-SEN》 character, this card gets the following abilities until end of turn. "【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot be returned to your opponent's hand, position cannot be moved, and cannot be put into your opponent's memory." "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose 1 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavorText: Are there any of those cute little destroyers in our fleet?

name: Chao Ho
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《KAN-SEN》 character, this card gets +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and put it on an open position in their stage.
flavorText: Don't let her trick you into thinking I'm the little sister!

name: Prince of Wales
text: 【CONT】 This card can be played from your hand without fulfilling color requirements. 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Eagle Union》 character. 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have 3 or more other 《Eagle Union》 characters, all of your other 《Eagle Union》 characters get +1000 power, and this card gets +500 power.
flavorText: I, Prince of Wales, shall let you witness my true strength.

name: Saint Louis
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, this card gets +500 power for each of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: I shall in return clear all obstacles standing before yours.

name: Neptune
text: 【AUTO】 Experience [Put 1 《KAN-SEN》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 cost 0 or lower character in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: That simply will not do, Commander, keeping me waiting all this time~

name: Jervis
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, you may choose 1 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, this card gets +4000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Though it's fine to be absorbed in your work, try not to neglect the people around you.

name: Queen Elizabeth
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Royal Navy》 characters get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When your climax with in its trigger icon is placed on your climax area, all of your characters get +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Make sure to remember my name!

name: Richelieu
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +1500 power for each of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card's level 2 or higher battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《KAN-SEN》 character, you may choose 1 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Place your faith in me. Follow my lead.

name: Monarch
text: 【CONT】 Experience During your turn, if the total level of the cards in your level is 5 or higher, this card gets +5500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room." 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 climax with in its trigger icon, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Until I met you, there was nary a single soul who believed in me.

name: Howe
text: 【CONT】 When your opponent has a level 3 or higher character, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have 2 or more other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 2 cards, choose 2 cards in your hand, put them into your waiting room, and perform the following action. "You may choose 1 of your opponent's level 1 or higher characters. If you do, your opponent choose 1 level X or lower character in their waiting room, and exchange them. X is equal to the level of the character you chose -1."
flavorText: I hope we can build a healthy relationship.

name: Erebus
text: 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《KAN-SEN》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: I followed your voice and have come from afar.

name: Glorious
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if all of your characters are 《KAN-SEN》, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Your glory has arrived!

name: Hood
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax with in its trigger icon is placed on your climax area, all of your characters get +500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters ×500.
flavorText: Being able to maintain an air of elegance at all times is the hallmark of royalty.

name: Black Prince
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: By your will, I am at your disposal.

name: Swiftsure
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2000 power for each other 《KAN-SEN》 character in your back stage. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if a climax with in its trigger icon is in your climax area, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《KAN-SEN》 character, draw up to 2 cards, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: If it is not too much for one such as myself to ask, I would like to support your fleet in whatever way I can.

name: Universal Bulin
text: Choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Choose 1 of your 《KAN-SEN》 characters, and that character gets +1 level and +X power until the end of your opponent's next turn. X is equal to the level of that character ×1000." "Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《KAN-SEN》 character, put it into your hand." (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: Bulin? Did I just get an upgrade?!

name: Maid Squad's Service
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Dido: "M-Master... I am honored to receive your affections, but... this is most unorthodox…"

name: Owner's Favorites?
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Cheshire: "Where've you been, Owner?"

name: Afternoon Tea
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Sirius: "It is good to see you return. There is tea and a light meal prepared for you. "

name: Knight Princesses' Fantasy
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Le Triomphant: "Le Malin, we can fight together once again!"

name: All Too Reliable Side of Her
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Swordfish squadron, prepare for battle!

name: Shimakaze
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have another 《KAN-SEN》 character, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Experience At the end of this card's attack, if "Upon the Shimmering Blue" is in your climax area, the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, you have another 《KAN-SEN》 character, and there are no characters facing this card or the character facing this card is 【REVERSE】, search your deck for up to 1 《KAN-SEN》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and this card gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: No type of operation is beyond my capabilities! Ha-hah!

name: Nagato
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《KAN-SEN》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 During your turn, if this card is in the middle position of your center stage, and you have 4 or more other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, all of your 《Sakura Empire》 characters get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: Everyone's faces are full of laughter here... I think I am rather fond of this place!

name: Shinano
text: 【AUTO】 During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, at the beginning of the encore step, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Experience [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Ephemeral Dream" is in your climax, and the total level of the cards in your level is 6 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top 9 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and deal 1 damage to your opponent X times. X is equal is to the number of climax among those cards. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: You have returned. Long, eternal, has this one's wait been...

name: Taihou
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Return this card to your hand] When "Phoenix's Spring Song" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."
flavorText: We meet at last, my dear Commander!

name: Amagi
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When your climax with in its trigger icon is placed on your climax area, choose up to 2 characters in your opponent's center stage, and those characters get -1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: All setbacks are but fodder for our victories.

name: Hanazuki
text: 【AUTO】 During your turn, when your other character's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《KAN-SEN》 character from your waiting room into the bottom of your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 cost 0 or lower 《KAN-SEN》 character with level equal to or lower than your level, put it on any position of your stage as 【REST】, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Mhm, I'm sure the four seasons exist so that all flowers have a chance to bloom.

name: Kashino
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into your opponent's clock. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 {Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: ♪~ Commander, I brought you your tea.

name: Noshiro
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax with in its trigger icon is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock." 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《KAN-SEN》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: You should first calm down, think of a way forward, and only then act. That's how I tackle things.

name: Ibuki
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is 5 or higher, this card gets +2500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may pay the cost. If you do, put up to 2 cards from the top of your deck into your stock." 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
flavorText: Was it your voice that beckoned me from my timeless slumber?

name: Hakuryuu
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is 8 or higher, this card gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 [(3) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock.
flavorText: My katana is my soul. Should it leave my side, I... Never mind, forget I said anything.

name: Azuma
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is 8 or higher, this card gets +500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card direct attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 Experience When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the total level of the cards in your level is 8 or higher, choose up to 2 of your opponent's characters, and return them to their hand.
flavorText: Do not worry, I will be right here with you the whole time.

name: Katsuragi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your stock. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -X power until end of turn. X is equal the number of other 《KAN-SEN》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: I'm not just a carrier, I'm a full-fledged aircraft carrier, meaning that I can do everything that an aircraft carrier is supposed to do!

name: Asashio
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《KAN-SEN》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if a climax with in its trigger icon is in your climax area, you may draw 2 cards. If you do, choose 2 cards in your hand, and put them into your waiting room.
flavorText: Commander... do you want to help me find them?

name: I-168
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I'm bored... Entertain me, Commander!

name: Kasumi
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax with in its trigger icon from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 6 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《KAN-SEN》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Commander, would you like to talk to Foo?

name: Yuudachi
text: 【CONT】 Experience During your turn, if the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 card from your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock." 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I smell meat! Where is it?! Tell me right now!

name: Kitakaze
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When your climax with in its trigger icon is placed on your climax area, this card gets +500 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card's level is 1 or higher, put it into your stock." (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: I, Kitakaze, swear to meet their expectations, and will work hard to protect everyone.

name: Yukikaze
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if all of your characters are 《KAN-SEN》, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, you may 【REST】 this card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: I shall be your lucky star from now on, so be grateful! Wa ha ha!

name: Suruga
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Kii", all of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters get +500 power. 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [(1) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Choose up to 1 "Kii" in your hand, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: Don't be afraid to ask for my help, should you need it.

name: Kii
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Suruga" in your back stage, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 3 of your 《KAN-SEN》 characters, and those characters get +500 power and +1 soul.
flavorText: Obviously I like being on the center stage with my massive cannons.

name: Fusou
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Yamashiro" in your center stage, this card gets +3000 power and +1 soul. 【CONT】 All of your other "Yamashiro" get +1000 power and +1 soul. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《KAN-SEN》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Yamashiro", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Would you like to have your fortune told?

name: Mutsu
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 《KAN-SEN》 from your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: I saw something interesting outside! Can I go check it out?

name: Naganami
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, all of your 《KAN-SEN》 characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Love! I love you, and everyone else as well!

name: Agano
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your main phase, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: Commander, fantastic work on the last sortie. May I offer you some hot tea?

name: Fubuki
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have another 《KAN-SEN》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Yoohoo~ I am the destroyer who recently made the world tremble, call me Fubuki!

name: Yamashiro
flavorText: Milord, you smell really nice~

name: Souryuu
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Hiryuu" in your center stage, this card gets +3500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn." 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Hiryuu", put it on any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Commander, why are you daydreaming?

name: Hiryuu
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Souryuu" in your center stage, this card gets +3500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] During your opponent's turn, when this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card, and at the beginning of your next encore step, put this card into your waiting room." 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1"Souryuu", put it on any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Victory goes the one who strikes first! Planes, take off!

name: Kinu
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《KAN-SEN》 character ×1000.
flavorText: If you want this demon to do your bidding, then you'd better show me what you're capable of!

name: I-19
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《KAN-SEN》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When a climax with in its trigger icon is placed on your climax area, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Aren't I amazing? I am, right?

name: Shoukaku
text: 【CONT】 If you have another"Zuikaku", this card gets +2000 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +4000 power." 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《KAN-SEN》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Zuikaku" in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may choose 1 of your "Zuikaku" and this card, and exchange them as 【STAND】.
flavorText: How troublesome~

name: Zuikaku
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Shoukaku", this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Frank Cynic" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and you have another "Shoukaku", choose up to 1 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose up to 1 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: I am the auspicious crane, after all!

name: Bombing Ships
text: If you have 5 or more 《KAN-SEN》 characters, deal 4 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Ephemeral Dream
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Shinano: "Even the most beautiful flower is transient, to be scattered into the wind…"

name: Upon the Shimmering Blue
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Shimakaze: "Houshou's carrot cake is just divine! I hope to taste it again sometime."

name: Phoenix's Spring Song
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Taihou: "It turns out we're not the same size~ So what could I do? I made it myself♡"

name: Frank Cynic
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Shoukaku: "The melody of my flute is a requiem for the dead."

name: Zara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if all of your characters are 《KAN-SEN》, choose up to 2 of your characters, and those characters get +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《KAN-SEN》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to your hand.
flavorText: I'm the heavy cruiser, Zara, and I look forward to bringing victory and glory to your fleet.

name: August von Parseval
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is 3 or higher, this card gets +2500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《KAN-SEN》 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Experience [Put 1 "Witches' Banquet?" from your climax area into your waiting room] During your climax phase, if this card is placed on the stage by the effect of "Witches' Banquet?", and the total level of the cards in your level is 3 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card, choose up to 2 of your opponent's characters, and those characters get the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot move to another position of the stage."
flavorText: You've finally come, my familiar... Pardon, my "commander."

name: Roon
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is 6 or higher, this card gets +1500 power, and the following ability. "【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -2 soul until end of turn." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: I'm getting a little excited.

name: Friedrich der Große
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Experience When this card attacks, if "Rhapsodie of Darkness" is in your climax area, and the total level of the cards in your level is 8 or higher, choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "Choose up to 3 cards in your opponent's waiting room, return them to your opponent's deck, your opponent shuffles their deck, and this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.""[(2)] You may pay the cost. If you do, deal 4 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: The performers can wait no longer!

name: Peter Strasser
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Yes, it seems as if I've spent my time wisely.

name: Ulrich von Hutten
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck, your opponent chooses 1 event or character from among them, you put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: If you've got something to say, spit it out. I'll hear you out.

name: Libeccio
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《KAN-SEN》, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Daily Lives Filled With Influence" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and you have another 《KAN-SEN》 character, you may choose 1 cost 0 or lower 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: Ciao! Commander, let's give it our all today as well!

name: Admiral Graf Spee
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in your center stage, all of your 《KAN-SEN》 characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Choose 1 "Until the End This Time" in your climax area and put it into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage by the effect of "Until the End This Time", you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card, and all of your characters get +500 power and the following ability until the end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character on the top of your opponent's deck."
flavorText: I will fight for you till the very end.

name: U-110
text: 【ACT】 [【REST】 1 of your 《KAN-SEN》 characters] Choose 1 《KAN-SEN》 character in your level and 1 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, and exchange them. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Choose 1 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."
flavorText: Mess with me and I'll bite yooouuu.

name: Elbing
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck, if it is a 《KAN-SEN》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《KAN-SEN》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or put into the waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card.
flavorText: Commander? Are you hurt? Not even a scratch?

name: Vittorio Veneto
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 2 times per turn. When your other 《KAN-SEN》 character is put on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: You are in your right to delegate missions to me, your secretary.

name: Odin
text: 【CONT】 Experience During your turn, if the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 other 《KAN-SEN》 character in the middle position of your center stage and this card, exchange them as 【STAND】, and this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I am Odin. I hereby take up post as your tactician.

name: Aquila
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "This card gets +6000 power until end of turn." "Choose 1 of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, and that character gets +3000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn." 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your 《KAN-SEN》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Our meeting today is no mere coincidence. No, it must be a gift from Fortuna herself.

name: Ägir
text: 【AUTO】 Experience When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the total level of cards in your level is 8 or higher, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "[(1)] You may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 climax in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and this card gets +1500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn." "This card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -2 soul.""
flavorText: Hehehe... Now let's find out what you can accomplish with my arsenal of talents.

name: Deutschland
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 0 or lower characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《KAN-SEN》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Don't answer me with "mhm." You will answer me with "yes, ma'am" from now on. Are we clear?

name: Graf Zeppelin
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Iron Blood Wings" is in your climax area, and your hand has 6 or less cards, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Iron Blood》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of that card. (Climax are regarded as 0)
flavorText: My only desire? To end the world.

name: Z46
text: 【CONT】 If your hand has 5 or more cards, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Experience [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the total level of cards in your level is 2 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's level 1 or higher characters, choose 1 level X or lower character in your opponent's waiting room, and exchange them. X is equal to the level of the character you chose -1.
flavorText: A name is not merely a label. It is also proof that one exists in this world.

name: Emden
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, if you have another 《KAN-SEN》 character, choose 1 of the following abilities, and this card gets that ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +3000 power." "【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card gets +3000 power." 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I shall make real your every desire. "Heehee. Submit to Emden. Submit to us."

name: Seydlitz
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《KAN-SEN》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: My tenacity is my pride, my conquests are my glory, and executing your orders is my mission!

name: U-47
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《KAN-SEN》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room." 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
flavorText: ...If that's all, I'll be in my room.

name: Wisdom Cubes
text: Reveal the top card of your deck, search your deck for up to 1 level X or lower 《KAN-SEN》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Witches' Banquet?
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText: Ägir: "Would you like it... if I came a bit closer?"

name: Rhapsodie of Darkness
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: The performers can wait no longer! Hurry, let us raise the curtains of battle!

name: Daily Lives Filled With Influence
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText: Maestrale: "G-good morning to you, Commander…"

name: Until the End This Time
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText: No matter how poor the odds are, I will always head for the battlefield.

name: Iron Blood Wings
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: If gods truly exist in this world, let us begin our slaughter with them.

name: Pamiat' Merkuria
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, this card gets +4000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: I'm charismatic, experienced, and cute - all the things YOU aren't!

name: Cleveland
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《KAN-SEN》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, all of your 《KAN-SEN》 characters get +500 power until end of turn. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: I'm Cleveland, a knight of the sea!

name: Bremerton
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《KAN-SEN》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "After-School Ace" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. If X is equal to 2 or higher, this card gets +1 soul until end of turn. X is equal to the total level of cards put into your waiting room by this effect. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: We're always on standby! You need somethin' done, hit me up!

name: New Jersey
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is 6 or higher, all of your 《Eagle Union》 characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Experience [(1)] When this card attacks, if "You Like This, Right?" is in your climax area, and the total level of the cards in your level is 6 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal X damage to your opponent. X is equals to the number of "New Jersey" you have. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: The indomitable Black Dragon of the Eagle Union is none other than me, New Jersey!

name: Eldridge
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a 《KAN-SEN》 character, this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a climax, return all of the characters in your center stage to your hand. (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Commander, hug...

name: Nicholas
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or when this card attacks, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I'm not sleepy... I just can't open my eyes.

name: Reno
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a 《KAN-SEN》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I was just basking in the amazing feeling of a sidekick watching her hero work up close~

name: Independence
text: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if there is a climax in your climax area, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock. 【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal 1 "New Jersey" in your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Commander, whenever you have something to say, tell it to me straight.

name: Massachusetts
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《KAN-SEN》, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room]." 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if there is a climax with in its trigger icon in your climax area, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Oh, Commander, are you going for a stroll?

name: Shangri-La
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2)] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. At the end of this card's attack, if "Observer of the Sky and Sea" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《KAN-SEN》 character, 【STAND】 this card. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal 1 "New Jersey" in your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I'd like to share the stories in this notebook with you someday...

name: Georgia

If you do, search your deck for up to 1 climax with the same card name as a climax in your waiting room, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: As long as I'm here, we can deal with any enemy, no matter how far they are.

name: Dido
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +500 power for each of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "To the Proud You" is in your climax area, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 "Royal Navy" or 《KAN-SEN》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I am in your service as a Royal Maid.

name: Newcastle
flavorText: You'll have to get a bit closer if you want to share this umbrella.

name: Centaur
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if all of your characters are 《KAN-SEN》, you may choose 1 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I swear to follow the examples of my Elders and strive for greatness once more today!

name: Duke of York
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Therefore... would thou give thy everything to me?

name: Nelson
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《KAN-SEN》 characters you have ×1000. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card's level 2 or higher battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Hmph. Enemies like these aren't even worth the time.

name: Illustrious
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put up to 1 card from the top of your clock into your waiting room, and this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your encore step, if "Never-Ending Tea Party" is in your climax area, this card is in your center stage, and you have 2 or more other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -3 soul."
flavorText: Greetings, Commander.

name: Victorious
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, search your deck for up to 1 《KAN-SEN》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: As long as I am here, our endeavours shall be smooth!

name: Royal Navy
text: If you do not have a 《Royal Navy》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. You may choose 1 of your 《Royal Navy》 characters, and put it into your waiting room. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 4 《Royal Navy》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Royal Navy Ships
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText: Belfast: "Master, the ladies who went off for commissions have been waiting for you to greet them."

name: Never-Ending Tea Party
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Illustrious: "Today's scones are Edinburgh's signature dish."

name: To the Proud You
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Sirius: "Regardless of what may ever happen, I shall always accompany you."

name: Kawakaze
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《KAN-SEN》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over the top 5 cards of your deck and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.
flavorText: The Solomon Islands... they call for me…

name: Hibiki
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose up to 2 of your characters, and those characters get +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Let's both get some good work done today!

name: Isuzu
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Nagara" get +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 Bond/"Nagara" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Nagara" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Aaaaaah!!! Commander! Don't scare me like that…

name: Akashi
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your 《KAN-SEN》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Want a check up?

name: Suzutsuki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《KAN-SEN》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《KAN-SEN》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have another 《KAN-SEN》 character, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: The enemy general's head is mine~! Just kidding, ahaha~♪

name: Takao
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When your other 《KAN-SEN》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Even back in port, we must not lower our guard. Danger lurks around every corner.

name: Inazuma
text: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]".
flavorText: Commander? Would you like to have your head patted too?

name: Yoizuki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, all of your characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's trigger check reveals a climax, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand." 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: Why I help people? I feel I should; therefore I do it.

name: Shigure
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《KAN-SEN》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may reveal up to 3 cards from the top of your deck. If you revealed 1 or more cards, choose up to 1 《KAN-SEN》 character from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Heheh, it's about time people acknowledged that luck is also a part of one's strength♪

name: Ayanami
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have 2 or more other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Snack Time" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《KAN-SEN》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, if the character you chose is level 3 or higher, draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: I've inspected the communication equipment. It won't cause any more problems…

name: Nagara
flavorText: What kind of girl do you like, Commander? Hehe. Oh yeah?

name: Atago
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《KAN-SEN》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Please allow your big sister Atago to take good care of you from now on!

name: Hiei
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Commander, where shall we go next?

name: Kongou
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2500 power for each other 《KAN-SEN》 character in your back stage. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, you may choose 1 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: I shall illuminate the path that leads to victory!

name: Akagi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of "Kaga", you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Sentiments and Fireworks" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Commander, if you had taken any more of your sweet time, I would have turned this place into a sea of fire~

name: Kaga
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Akagi" get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Akagi" in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage.
flavorText: Will I be able to find a worthy foe here?

name: Sakura Empire
text: If you do not have a 《Sakura Empire》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. Search your deck for up to 1 《Sakura Empire》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: Four Sisters of Kongou
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText: Kirishima: "Okay, say "cheese!""

name: Sentiments and Fireworks
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Kaga: "Forgetting about war and just enjoying the holidays... this isn't so bad every once in a while."

name: Snack Time
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Ayanami: "Commander, have you eaten yet? Here's some snacks."

name: Z1
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Z2" get +1 soul. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Z2" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Z2" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: ‌Fast and strong, that's me!

name: Admiral Hipper
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, all of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters get +500. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over the top 5 cards of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.
flavorText: Haah? What are you fantasizing about? I only happened to bump into you while patrolling the port.

name: Z23
text: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: Let's go! It's time to reap the rewards of our hard work!

name: Z24
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《KAN-SEN》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of characters your opponent has. 【AUTO】 When your opponent's climax is placed on their climax area, you may put this card into your stock.
flavorText: All you need to do is grovel at my feet!

name: Nürnberg
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《KAN-SEN》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Starting today, I shall serve you to the best of my abilities... Is that acceptable?

name: Leipzig
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: ‌C-commander... Please don't stare at me...

name: U-96
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Hehe, I'll have you drowning in reports of my success soon enough.

name: Elbe
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《KAN-SEN》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: You can't just touch me as you please~♪ Come on, beg for my permission!

name: U-556
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《KAN-SEN》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if you have another 《KAN-SEN》 character, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Don't you feel super pumped on a day like this?

name: Prinz Eugen
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《KAN-SEN》, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Experience [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Naive Scheme" is in your climax area, and the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《KAN-SEN》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】."
flavorText: How long can you keep me amused? I'm looking forward to it.

name: Z2
flavorText: This little one is Lebe. Yes, you heard that correctly.

name: Prinz Adalbert
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《KAN-SEN》 characters, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]".
flavorText: Time to get motivated.

name: Weser
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Before you hurry off to do your work, why not first take a seat and enjoy a cup of coffee?

name: Prinz Heinrich
text: 【CONT】 Experience During your turn, if the total level of cards in your level is 5 or higher, this card gets +1500 power for each of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: Let's get fired up and do this thing! Hahahah!

name: Tirpitz
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《KAN-SEN》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: It is up to you to show me the world.

name: Bismarck
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When "The Charisma of Black Iron" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, all of your other characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, choose up to 2 cards from among them, put them on the top of their deck in any order, and put the rest into their waiting room."
flavorText: I have fought many foes on many fronts. You may call upon me whenever there is a problem.

name: Iron Blood
text: If you do not have an 《Iron Blood》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. You may choose 1 《Iron Blood》 character in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your 《Iron Blood》 characters, and that character gets +4000 power until end of turn.

name: Army of Bonds
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText: Deutschland: "I'm going to enjoy mopping you all up~"

name: The Charisma of Black Iron
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Bismarck: "Such honors may please a weakling, but I am strong."

name: Naive Scheme
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Z23: "We still have so much to review about the previous battle…"
